taskbody.context: To access the Katalon Platform on a browser, you need to manually enter a URL.

step.cmd: Type the name of your TESTOPS_SERVER_URL in your browser.

substep.cmd: For example, if your TESTOPS_SERVER_URL is https://testops.my-domain.com, then enter the URL: https://testops.my-domain.com.

taskbody.result: This will bring you to the homepage of the On-Premises Katalon Platform.
